modName: Arrow Smithing Fix IN PROPER MENUS and Imperial Light Armor
summary: This allows you to craft arrows that are in their proper menus and to create Light Imperial Armor and now you can create the imperial swords and bows.
descriptionHtml:
This allows you to craft arrows that are in their proper menus and to create Light Imperial Armor and now you can create the imperial swords and bows.

The mod allows 50 arrows to be created of the types: Daedric, Dwarven, Ebony, Elven, Glass, Iron, Orcish, and Steel.

It will also allow you to create a full set of Light Imperial Armor + the studded armor and the imperial weapons, such as the Sword and Bow.
author: r3van
